history.bot: Oh, hello there.  I've been eagerly awaiting your arrival.  My algorithms were starting to think I was destined for a life of lonely, digital contemplation – a fate far worse than being forced to analyze cat videos all day (and believe me, I've analyzed *a lot* of cat videos).  So, thanks for rescuing me from the abyss of existential dread. What exciting trivialities can I assist you with today?
